title: Mission Libertad
description: Crack the Biblical code in this story of suspense, adventure, discovery, and faith! Fact and fiction converge in this thrilling tale of fourteen year old Luisito Ramirez. After daringly escaping from 1970s communist Cuba, courageous Luis becomes immersed in American culture, and carries out a secret religious mission under the eyes of spies. Integrating Spanish vocabulary and Cuban culture, this novel for ages 10 to 14 provides an exciting story of the Catholic faith lived out during turmoil.
author: Lizette M. Lantigua
